title: Launcher Problems (important)
body: I switched to Turkey by mistake, its a 1gb patch, how can I switch back without updating? (EU West) much appreciated {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Even if the patch for a different region started, you should still be able to click and change the region back to normal. 

https://i.gyazo.com/0e7b31bf97690fa857f40c345fc6df15.png

http://prntscr.com/fd6q81
Can't click anything because its grayed out then:
http://prntscr.com/fd6qo4

Appreciated. :)
Managed to leave the install overnight.. then I switched back
Yea you're gonna have to wait for the client to come back up before you can change the region back. Wait for that small update and then you'll be able to switch back with no problems.
You can not switch back without updating as the servers use different files(Audio, ect). They only way is to re-patch unfortunately.
